text: The 2018-19 Bayamón FC season, will be the twentieth season since the club's formation. ==Overview== In July 2019, it was announced that Delfí Ferreres returned as head coach of Bayamón FC for the 2019-2020 season.https://futbolboricua.co/regresa-delfi-ferreres-a-bayamon-fc/ Bayamón FC celebrated its 20th anniversary on September 30, 2019 with a friendly match against Caguas Sporting FC.https://futbolboricua.co/bayamon-fc-celebro- sus-20-anos-con-partido-conmemorativo/ ==Competitions== ===Pre-season=== ====Friendlies==== ===Liga Puerto Rico=== ==References== Category:2019 in Puerto Rican football Category:2020 in Puerto Rican football Category:Bayamón FC
title: 2019–20 Bayamón FC season
